name: Purple Haze Premium
shortDescription: Classic sativa-dominant strain with vibrant purple hues
description: Experience the legendary Purple Haze strain with high THCA content and exceptional terpene profile. This sativa-dominant hybrid delivers an uplifting and energizing experience perfect for daytime use. Lab-tested for purity and potency.

name: OG Kush Classic
shortDescription: Indica-dominant strain with earthy pine flavors
description: The legendary OG Kush delivers potent effects with a complex terpene profile featuring myrcene and limonene. Perfect for evening relaxation with high THCA content and exceptional quality standards.

name: Blue Dream Pre-Roll
shortDescription: Perfectly rolled hybrid for on-the-go enjoyment
description: Expertly crafted pre-rolls featuring our premium Blue Dream flower. Each joint is carefully rolled with natural papers and contains 1 gram of high-THCA flower. Perfect for sharing or personal use.

name: Gelato Vape Cartridge
shortDescription: Premium distillate vape with natural terpenes
description: Pure THCA distillate infused with natural Gelato terpenes. Our 510-thread cartridges use ceramic heating elements for optimal flavor delivery. Lab-tested for pesticides and heavy metals.

name: Wedding Cake
shortDescription: Sweet indica-dominant flower with vanilla notes
description: Indulge in the sweet and relaxing effects of Wedding Cake. This indica-dominant strain features dense, frosty buds with a complex flavor profile of vanilla and cake batter. High THCA content ensures potent effects.

name: Sour Diesel 5-Pack
shortDescription: Five premium pre-rolls of energizing Sour Diesel
description: Perfect for sharing or stocking up. This 5-pack contains premium Sour Diesel pre-rolls, each containing 0.5g of high-THCA flower. Sour Diesel is known for its diesel aroma and energizing sativa effects.

name: Northern Lights Vape
shortDescription: Classic indica strain in premium vape format
description: Experience the legendary Northern Lights in our premium vape cartridge. This pure indica strain provides deeply relaxing effects perfect for evening use. CO2 extracted for maximum purity and potency.

name: Gorilla Glue #4
shortDescription: Potent hybrid with sticky, resinous buds
description: One of the most potent strains available, Gorilla Glue #4 delivers heavy-handed euphoria and relaxation. These dense, resin-covered buds showcase the strain's legendary potency and distinct earthy aroma.
